issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: When {{testForcedRegistration}} calls {{waitForBlockReport()}}, it sometimes returns false because the timeout is too short (100ms).

comments.body: If I run this test case in a loop, the failure is reproduced in less than 10 runs. With the timeout changed to 2000 (2 seconds), it passes all the time. The test-level timeout of 10 seconds should be removed. The test run-time is very close to 10 seconds.
